mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.companyName,m.companyAddress,m.creditCode,m.businessLicense,m.representative, m.companyTel,m.fax,m.contactPerson,m.contactNumber,m.installType,m.creater, m.createDate,m.updater,m.updatDate FROM maintenance m WHERE id=(SELECT u.companyId FROM USER u WHERE u.id=#{id} AND u.userRole=#{userRole})

SELECT u.id,u.userRole,u.companyId,u.deleted,u.realName,u.tel, u.userName,u.wenXin,u.password,u.buildingID,u.elevatorID,u.creater,u.createDate ,u.updater,u.updatDate FROM USER u WHERE companyId=(SELECT u.companyId FROM USER u WHERE u.userRole =4 AND u.id=#{id}) AND u.userRole=5
and realName like CONCAT('%', #{realName}, '%')
